api_list.name: Basketball
api_list.description: i will use this only for live feeds
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://basketball.p.rapidapi.comhttps://njsportsnetwork.com"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "basketball.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
